/work/doc/pages/MessageFields.md
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 \defgroup message-fields Message Fields
2 \ingroup sbe-protocol-message
3 
4 \details
5 
6 An SBE message provides access to message fields via its methods.
7 
8 To get/set a field value, use the corresponding method of the strongly typed message class.
9 
10 \section setters Setters
11 
12 The naming convention for setters is `setFieldName(..)`.
13 
14 \subsection setting-optional-field Setting Optional Fields
15 
16 To set the value of the optional field to `null`, use the `setFieldNameToNull()` method.
17 
18 It is also possible to use `NullFieldType` constants (OnixS::B3::BOE::Messaging::NullUInt32, OnixS::B3::BOE::Messaging::NullAllocID,
19 OnixS::B3::BOE::Messaging::NullAllocReportID, OnixS::B3::BOE::Messaging::NullBusinessRejectRefID, etc.).
20 
21 \section getters Getters
22 
23 The naming convention for getters is `fieldName()`.
24 
25 \subsection getting-optional-field Getting Optional Fields
26 
27 Getters for optional fields return `true` if the value is present, otherwise - `false`.
28 
29 \section example Example
30 
31 \snippet MessageFields.cpp messageFields
